attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I love driving but i've lost count, as I'm sure most of you have, of the amount of days i've sat on the roads of this great country. Instead of constantly widening existing roads why not construct (high speed) railway lines to run alongside?. 
These would be able to take freight and cars off the road. When new roads are announced they can take years to build and, once complete, are invariably at capacity almost as soon as they are finished. Something needs to change. URGENTLY

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
